translations: n.萨斯科奇人；大脚野人；北美野人

phrs.translation: 大脚怪, 大脚野人, 萨斯科奇人, 沙斯夸支
南方怪猿, 怪兽档案之南方怪猿

sentences.sentence: No.10 Your wife will turn into a sasquatch.
sentences.translation: 第十你妻子将会变成一个大脚野人。

sentences.sentence: Don't pick fights with guys who make 'Sasquatch' Sam look tiny.
sentences.translation: 别找让大脚山姆看起来很迷你的大傢伙们打架。

sentences.sentence: The Sasquatch phenomenon was never solely focused on the idea of a single creature, and people have always considered there might be a breeding colony.
sentences.translation: “萨斯夸奇”现象从来就没有被当作个案来考虑，人们始终相信有许多这种生物在一个隐秘的地方繁殖生长。
